exceptions.tactic: pose proof (constructive_choice (pos n) (R) H) as [f Hf].
exceptions.exn: In environment X : Type n : nat R : pos n -> X -> Prop H : forall p : pos n, exists x : X, R p x The term "pos n" has type "Set" while it is expected to have type "?X -> Type".

original: intros H. pose proof (constructive_choice (pos n) (R) H) as [f Hf]. exists f. auto.
